bibl.title: Women's Influence on Classical Civilization
bibl.note: Focuses on three 'case-studies' about the role of women in Roman Egypt: Nomenclature; - Literacy; - Funerary representations.
bibl.seg: ROWLANDSON Jane, Gender and Cultural Identity in Roman Egypt.
Fiona McHARDY and Eireann MARSHALL (Edd.), Women's Influence on Classical Civilization (London - New York, 2004) pp. 151-166, 2 tabl., 2 figg.
Focuses on three 'case-studies' about the role of women in Roman Egypt: Nomenclature; - Literacy; - Funerary representations.
